entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind south 30 km/h. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
